item.title: ionic에서 css를 사용한 flip card 구현하기
item.description: 다음과 같이 간략하게 과정을 정리해 본다. 1) html toggle <section class="container"> <div id="card"> <figure class="front">1</figure> <figure class="back">2</figure> </div> </section> 2) css .container { width: 200px; height: 260px; position: relative; perspective: 800px; } #card { width: 100%; height: 100%; position: absolute; transform-style: preserve-3d; transition: transform 1s; } #card figure { display: block; position: absolute; width: 100%; height: 100%; backface-visibility: hidden; } #card .front { background: red; } #card .back { background: blue; transform: rotateY( 180deg ); } #card.
